title: Why does OCE even get snowday?
body: OCE should have "Fuukkk it's hot " skins. The Snowdown/day is BS in OCE.

replies.body: because they're not going to not give a server skins because it only snows in like 4 places for that server.
Apparently, Australia get's more snow than Switzerland, so it's not that we don't get it, it's just not in the populated areas. I guess being summer, the timing is off for us though.
